BackgroundColor.description: Indicates background color of content area

BorderColor.description: Indicates color of border surrounding content area

BorderWidth.description: Indicates pixel width of border surrounding content area

CategoryID.description: Specifies the identifier of the folder.

Cellpadding.description: Indicates pixel value of padding around content area

Cellspacing.description: Indicates pixel value of spacing for content area

Content.description: Identifies content contained in a content area.

FontFamily.description: Indicates font family used in content area

HasFontSize.description: Indicates whether the content area includes a specified font size or not

IsBlank.description: Indicates if specified content area contains no content.

IsDynamicContent.description: Indicates if specific content area contains dynamic content.

IsLocked.description: Indicates if specific email content area within an Enterprise or Enterprise 2.0 account is locked and cannot be changed by subaccounts.

IsSurvey.description: Indicates whether a specific content area contains survey questions.

Key.description: Specifies key associated with content area in HTML body. Relates to the Email object via a custom type.

Name.description: Name of the object or property.

Width.description: Indicates pixel width of content area
